io.micronaut.starter.options

Class AbstractTestRockerModelProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.starter.options.AbstractJunitRockerModelProvider
      • io.micronaut.starter.options.AbstractTestRockerModelProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JunitRockerModelProvider, TestRockerModelProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateCommandCommand.CustomTestRockerModelProvider

    public abstract class AbstractTestRockerModelProvider
extends AbstractJunitRockerModelProvider
implements TestRockerModelProvider
    Defines an abstract class to be extended to provide a{ @link RockerModel} to create RockerTemplate for tests generated by the CLI and Launch for the different Language and TestFramework valid combinations.
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
